All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Generic class that implements the basic SQL statements for a Database
Bill
This Class creates a PDF document representing a Bill for each order
Client
This class represents the Client table in the database
ClientBLL
Client Business Logic Class.
ClientDAO
Data Access Object Class for the Client table.
Command
This Class represents the format of a line read by the File Parser
DatabaseConnection
This class makes the connection to the Database
FileParser
This Class represents the File Parser that reads lines from the input file and gets the commands
Logic
This Class executes the commands processed by the File Parser
MainClass
MainClass of the application
OrderItem
This class represents the OrderItem table in the database
OrderItemBLL
OrderItem Business Logic Class.
OrderItemDAO
Data Access Object Class for the OrderItem table.
OrderTotal
This class represents the OrderTotal table in the database
OrderTotalBLL
OrderTotal Business Logic Class.
OrderTotalDAO
Data Access Object Class for the OrderTotal table.
Product
This class represents the Product table in the database
ProductBLL
Product Business Logic Class.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object Class for the Product table.
Report
Creates PDF Documents that show a table's Data
Understock
This Class creates a PDF document when an order is cancel because there is not enough stock
